alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cache and east central Box Elder Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 502 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tremonton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Logan, Tremonton, Hyrum, Wellsville, Bear River City, Benson, Peter, Utah State University, Riverside, North Logan, Nibley, Garland, Millville, River Heights, Honeyville, Mendon, Elwood, Deweyville, Collinston and College Ward. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 370 and 385. Interstate 84 between mile markers 39 and 42. US Route 89 near mile marker 459. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
